headline: Regeneron to Report Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Financial and Operating Results and Host Conference Call and Webcast on February 4, 2025
summary: TARRYTOWN, N.Y., Jan. 07, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: REGN) today announced that it will report its fourth quarter and full year 2024 financial and operating results on Tuesday, February 4, 2025, before the U.S. financial markets open. The Company will host a conference call and simultaneous webcast at 8:30 AM Eastern Time that day.
